content: *this tee shirt is knit using a cotton linen blend at a loose gauge the result is an elastic fabric that works up quickly and fits beautifully the top half of the yoke features a lace panel covering the shoulders and back * *named after the duality of the gemini this pullover can be worn with the lace to the back for a more casual look or with the lace facing forward for a dressier look * **gauge** 22 sts/28 row = 4 inches in stockinette stitch using us 6/4mm needles **sizes** xs s m l 1x 2x 3x shown in size s with 4 inches of negative ease **finished measurements** * chest 26 25 30 5 34 25 38 5 42 25 46 5 50 25 inches * length 20 5 21 21 25 21 5 21 75 22 22 25 inches **yarn** katia linen 53% cotton/47% linen 122yds/112m per 50g skein color 17 4 5 6 6 7 8 8 balls **recommended needle size** always use a needle size that gives you the gauge listed below -- every knitter s gauge is unique * 1 set us 5/3 75mm double-point needles set of 5 * 1 set us 6/4mm double-point needles set of 5 * 24-inch length us 5/3 75mm circular needle * 32-inch length us 6/4mm circular needle **notions** * yarn needle * 4 stitch markers * 1 removable stitch marker **translations** gemini en français 1 gemini in italiano 2 gemini magyar 3 gemini en español 4 gemini korean 한국어 5 1 https //drive google com/file/d/0b37yqiko8pwtbep5sljkufqwdm8/view usp=sharing&resourcekey=0-bcarui1iu-3z30uf55-how 2 https //drive google com/file/d/0b37yqiko8pwttzu1mktmd2u3bm8/view usp=sharing&resourcekey=0-lnd3ssyzb-wd8ga5pvz4cq 3 https //www knitcrochet hu/index php option=com_content&view=article&id=38 gemini-pulover&catid=9&itemid=101 4 https //drive google com/file/d/0b37yqiko8pwtcm1wnwp1agfxq00/view usp=sharing&resourcekey=0-srpytfnfbwcat3dfrasjfa 5 https //drive google com/file/d/0b37yqiko8pwtbwcwx3ptvgpmtnm/view usp=sharing&resourcekey=0-wthfqqc9gs1bxcxwyyjjng
